meanings: rather[sooner](than), better(than), first, preferably, in[for] preference
would rather die than live in disgrace

phrases.phrase: 스포츠 보는 걸 별로 안 좋아해요. 차라리 직접 하지요.
meanings: 스포츠 경기 관람 I don't like watching sports. I would rather play.

vlive.korean: 차라리 좀 거뭇거뭇한 게 낫겠지? It'll be better to be darker, right? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 쉼표방
vlive.english: It'll be better to be darker, right?

vlive.korean: [두 번씩(?) 옮기는 걸로 협희] - 그러자 - 아니면 두 번만 할까요 차라리? [Agreed to move twice] - Okay. - Shall we do that twice only? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
vlive.english: [Agreed to move twice] - Okay. - Shall we do that twice only?

vlive.korean: 당당하게 해 차라리! Just be confident about it! 듣기 View video GOT7 : [GOT2DAY 2019] 19. JB & BamBam
차라리 날 놀려주면 안 되냐? Can you just tease me instead? 듣기 View video iKON : ㄱㄱ
vlive.english: Can you just tease me instead?

vlive.korean: 차라리 의욕이 안 나... If you're not motivated it's better to... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [RADIO] 캐럿들 귀대귀대 #61
vlive.english: If you're not motivated it's better to...

examples.korean: She’d rather die than give a speech. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 연설을 하느니 차라리 죽는 게 나을 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’d rather die than give a speech. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’d rather use my money than leave it lying in the bank. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 돈을 은행에 그냥 넣어 두느니 차라리 쓰겠어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d rather use my money than leave it lying in the bank. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The walls were not white, but rather a sort of dirty grey. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 벽들은 흰색이 아니었다. 차라리 일종의 지저분한 회색이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The walls were not white, but rather a sort of dirty grey. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We urged them to sort out the problem sooner rather than later. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그들에게 차라리 일찌감치 그 문제를 해결하라고 촉구했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We urged them to sort out the problem sooner rather than later. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She swore that she wouldn’t apologize—she’d die first! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 절대 사과하지 않을 거라고 했어. 차라리 죽어 버리겠대! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She swore that she wouldn’t apologize—she’d die first! Add to Wordbook
